movies.title: Shelter
movies.overview: A man living in self-imposed exile on a remote island rescues a young girl from a violent storm, setting off a chain of events that forces him out of seclusion to protect her from enemies tied to his past.

movies.title: Return to Silent Hill
movies.overview: When James receives a mysterious letter from his lost love Mary, he is drawn to Silent Hill—a once-familiar town now consumed by darkness. As he searches for her, James faces monstrous creatures and unravels a terrifying truth that will push him to the edge of his sanity.

movies.title: Hamnet
movies.overview: The powerful story of love and loss that inspired the creation of Shakespeare's timeless masterpiece, Hamlet.

movies.title: Dead Man's Wire
movies.overview: In 1977, former real estate developer Tony Kiritsis puts a dead man's switch on himself and the mortgage banker who did him wrong, demanding $5 million and a personal apology.

movies.title: Arco
movies.overview: 10-year-old Arco lives in a far future. During his first flight in his rainbow suit, he loses control and falls into the past. Iris, a girl his age from 2075, comes to his rescue and tries by all means to help send him back to his era.

movies.title: 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple
movies.overview: Dr. Kelson finds himself in a shocking new relationship - with consequences that could change the world as they know it - and Spike's encounter with Jimmy Crystal becomes a nightmare he can't escape.

movies.title: Mercy
movies.overview: In the near future, a detective stands on trial accused of murdering his wife. He has ninety minutes to prove his innocence to the advanced AI Judge he once championed, before it determines his fate.

movies.title: Marty Supreme
movies.overview: Marty Mauser, a young man with a dream no one respects, goes to hell and back in pursuit of greatness.

movies.title: The Housemaid
movies.overview: Trying to escape her past, Millie Calloway accepts a job as a live-in housemaid for the wealthy Nina and Andrew Winchester. But what begins as a dream job quickly unravels into something far more dangerous—a sexy, seductive game of secrets, scandal, and power.

movies.title: Firebreak
movies.overview: Little Lide disappears in the forest while her family packs up their home. As a fire breaks out, her mother must race to reach her before the flames do.
